EmailTemplate.subject: Are You Keeping These in Mind?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Rates A low rate doesn’t always mean low overall cost, so looking for transparent rates and reading the fine print can save money in the long run. Types of Plans Some providers offer credit card readers for free while others charge based on capabilities. Fees Aside from transaction fees, be on the lookout for compliance, interchange, statement, cancellation and gateway access fees. Contracts Before agreeing to a contract, merchants should know the contract’s length and requirements for early termination fees.
